name: Lakshay Kumar
about: I design and build production-ready GenAI systems—agents, automation pipelines, and AI-powered products. Currently working at the intersection of AI, fintech, and SaaS, with a strong focus on turning messy real-world problems into clean, usable tools.
highlights: GenAI, LLM agents, automation & backend systems
Founder of DocIQ — a document intelligence & sharing platform
Hands-on with Python, FastAPI, cloud infrastructure, and data pipelines
Builder mindset: ship fast, iterate hard, optimize for impact
